name: symphonycss
description: Symphony v0.1 Model Anthology - A modular, semantic-first CSS framework with modern CSS features

scripts.build:bundle: cat src/core/_fonts.css src/core/_reset.css src/core/_variables.css src/core/_tokens.css src/core/_base.css src/layout/_container.css src/layout/_grid.css src/layout/_flexbox.css src/components/_typography.css src/components/_buttons.css src/components/_forms.css src/components/_cards.css src/utilities/_spacing.css src/utilities/_helpers.css > dist/symphony.css
scripts.build:minify: npx lightningcss --minify --targets '>= 0.25%' dist/symphony.css -o dist/symphony.min.css 2>&1 | grep -v 'webkit' || true
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:bundle && npm run build:minify

author: SymphonyUI
